name: Through His Eyes
description:
The game contains some flashing lights. 

 This game doesn't contain jumpscares, but still falls under the category of horror. - He wakes up - but is he really awake?  Reality isn't what it seems to be. Is this all a test - or a punishment maybe? Discover the truth through his eyes. -

If you liked playing this game, don't forget to leave a rating on the game, as this helps a lot!
